SEARCH
Package controllers

Class PatientController

Object
PatientController
public class PatientController extends Object
The PatientController class handles the operations for managing patient-related actions, such as retrieving and updating patient information, scheduling, rescheduling, and canceling appointments. It also interacts with appointment records and manages appointment status updates for the logged-in patient.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientController

      public PatientController(User user, DataStorage dataStorage)
      Constructs a PatientController for managing patient-specific operations.
      Parameters:
      user - The logged-in user, which should be a Patient.
      dataStorage - The DataStorage instance that contains all the data for managing appointments.

      Returns:

    • scheduleAppointment

      public String scheduleAppointment(String doctorId, String date, String time)
      Schedules a new appointment with a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor for the appointment.
      date - The date for the appointment.
      time - The time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment ID if the appointment is successfully scheduled; otherwise, null if the slot is unavailable.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public String rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, String newDate, String newTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDate - The new date for the appointment.
      newTime - The new time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      The new appointment ID if successfully rescheduled, or null if the new time slot is unavailable.

    • cancelAppointment

      public boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is successfully canceled, or false if the appointment cannot be canceled.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the appointment is not found or the status is not pending or scheduled.
      IllegalStateException - If the appointment does not have a patient ID.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of scheduled appointments for the logged-in patient.
      Returns:
      A list of scheduled appointments for the patient.

    • getCompletedAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getCompletedAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of completed appointments for the logged-in patient.
      Returns:
      A list of completed appointments for the patient.

    • displayDetails

      public String displayDetails(Appointment appointment)
      Displays the details of an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment whose details are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the appointment's details.
